landing.title: Sword Master
landing.subtitle: Become a Joseon swordsman and conquer the land!

samjeongdo.name: Samjeongdo
samjeongdo.description: A standard military sword of Joseon officers. Well-balanced weapon for both offense and defense.

drawAttack.name: Officer's Draw
drawAttack.effect: A textbook draw attack focused on fundamentals

katana.name: Katana
katana.description: The iconic sword of Japanese infantry. Excels at slashing with pressure on single targets.

drawAttack.name: Iaijutsu
drawAttack.effect: Draw and slash in one motion!

byeongdo.name: Byeongdo
byeongdo.description: A Chinese military sword. Simple and practical design, efficient in group combat.

drawAttack.name: Cross Slash
drawAttack.effect: Wide horizontal swing hitting 2 enemies

nagamaki.name: Nagamaki
nagamaki.description: A Japanese pole sword with a long handle and long blade. Its heavy cuts and impact transfer pressure armored infantry.

drawAttack.name: Poleblade Cleave
drawAttack.effect: A wide, impact-loaded cut from the long grip that still hits armored targets hard

nagamaki.specialEffect: Impact Transfer: +1 enemy delay on hit

jungdo.name: Jungdo
jungdo.description: A thick, wide-bladed Chinese sword. High piercing power against shields and heavy infantry.

drawAttack.name: Heavy Slash
drawAttack.effect: Crush the enemy with a heavy blade

bongukgeom.name: Bongukgeom
bongukgeom.description: The essence of Korean swordsmanship. A defensive control weapon that disrupts enemy attack flow.

drawAttack.name: Disruption
drawAttack.effect: **Skill Cancel**! Negates enemy's upcoming skill

gekkenkatana.name: Gekken Katana
gekkenkatana.description: A technique-focused sword for iaijutsu and counters. High skill ceiling rewards masters.

drawAttack.name: Lightning Flash
drawAttack.effect: Critical when enemy delay is 1!

jian.name: Jian
jian.description: A precision-focused thrusting sword. Low power but excellent skill scaling for control play.

drawAttack.name: Vital Strike
drawAttack.effect: Strike vital points precisely. Causes bleed.

bisu.name: Bisu
bisu.description: A simple and practical dagger. Specialized for stealth, escort, and quick preemptive strikes.

drawAttack.name: Preemptive Strike
drawAttack.effect: **Swift** Defense-ignoring critical when enemy delay is 1!

wakizashi.name: Wakizashi
wakizashi.description: A companion sword. Specialized for quick combos and conditional criticals.

yoroidoshi.name: Yoroidoshi
yoroidoshi.description: An armor-piercing dagger. Specialized for bleed and sustained damage against heavy targets.

drawAttack.name: Pierce & Cut
drawAttack.effect: **Skill Cancel** when enemy delay is 1.

jagaekdangeom.name: Assassin's Dagger
jagaekdangeom.description: A dagger for assassination and close-range takedowns. Specialized for poison effects.

drawAttack.name: Assassinate
drawAttack.effect: Defense-ignoring + deadly poison when enemy delay is 1!

woldo.name: Woldo
woldo.description: A large sword for generals. Specialized for multi-target attacks and area damage.

drawAttack.name: Grand Slash
drawAttack.effect: Swing the woldo wide for a full sweep!

nodachi.name: Nodachi
nodachi.description: An oversized greatsword. Overwhelming power and reach for aggressive pressure.

drawAttack.name: Great Iaijutsu
drawAttack.effect: Sweep with the massive blade

guandao.name: Guandao
guandao.description: The Green Dragon Crescent Blade. Its intimidating presence synergizes with morale debuffs.

drawAttack.name: Dragon Slash
drawAttack.effect: Slash all enemies with dragon's fury

jangwang.name: Afterglow
jangwang.description: A moment of letting go. The flash of sword enlightenment.

drawAttack.name: Flash
drawAttack.effect: Pierce all enemies with blinding light

chilseong.name: Seven Star Sword
chilseong.description: A divine blade imbued with the Big Dipper's power. A legendary sword of Baekje.

drawAttack.name: Seven Star Slash
drawAttack.effect: Starlight empowers the blade

saingum.name: Saingum
saingum.description: The sword of justice from Joseon. Cuts down evil and upholds righteousness.

drawAttack.name: Evil Slayer
drawAttack.effect: Cut down the wicked aura

muramasa.name: Muramasa
muramasa.description: The cursed Muramasa. A demon blade that hungers for blood.

drawAttack.name: Blood Slash
drawAttack.effect: The demon blade craves blood!

masamune.name: Masamune
masamune.description: The legendary Masamune. A blade imbued with the sword saint's soul.

drawAttack.name: Moonless
drawAttack.effect: Quiet as moonlight, yet razor sharp

kusanagi.name: Kusanagi
kusanagi.description: One of the Three Sacred Treasures. The grass-cutting sword.

drawAttack.name: Heavenly Cloud Slash
drawAttack.effect: Divine wind cuts down enemies

sweepingBlow.name: Sweep
sweepingBlow.description: Wide horizontal swing. Weapon range x2.

powerStrike.name: Power Strike
powerStrike.description: Single hit. After 1 wait, powerful strike! x3.0 damage.

quickSlash.name: Opening!
quickSlash.description: Strike at an opening. Critical with daggers

flashStrike.name: Flash Strike
flashStrike.description: Swift double strike! Doesn't reduce enemy delay.

followUpSlash.name: Follow-up
followUpSlash.description: Continue the attack flow. Only usable after attacking this turn.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Provoke enemy! Enemy delay -1, draw 1 card.

parry.name: Blade Lock
parry.description: Defense x5 for 1 wait. Counter on successful block!

ironWall.name: Deflect
ironWall.description: Defense x10 for 3 waits. Consumed after 1 block.

flowRead.name: Read the Flow
flowRead.description: Read for 5 waits. Defense/counter increases with wait!

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.description: ATK +5 for 3 turns. Restore 1 durability to all deck swords. (Consumable)

bladeDance.name: Blade Dance
bladeDance.description: Draw 3 cards! All drawn cards activate immediately!

sheathe.name: Sheathe
sheathe.description: Return weapon to hand. Sheathe card also returns to hand.

bladeSeeker.name: Blade Grab
bladeSeeker.description: Equip top sword from deck + draw attack! Next sword goes to hand.

soulRecall.name: Recall
soulRecall.description: Bring top 2 cards from grave to hand.

ancestorBlade.name: Grave Blade
ancestorBlade.description: Equip random sword from grave and use its draw attack.

sweepSlash.name: Sweep Slash
sweepSlash.description: Wide swing at weapon range x2 for x2.0 damage.

bladeStorm.name: Blade Storm
bladeStorm.description: Fierce swings cutting through all enemies.

finalJudgment.name: Final Judgment
finalJudgment.description: Strike so hard the blade shatters. *Weapon is destroyed after use.*

execution.name: Execution
execution.description: Execute in the name of justice!

perfectCast.name: Mastery
perfectCast.description: Cast skills perfectly regardless of durability

drawIncrease.name: Dexterity
drawIncrease.description: Draw 1 extra card at turn start

wounded_traveler.name: Wounded Traveler
wounded_traveler.description:
A wounded traveler lies by the road.
Will you help them?

outcomes.treasure: Thank you... Please accept this heirloom.

traveling_merchant.name: Traveling Merchant
traveling_merchant.description:
"Fine goods, noble swordsman!"
The merchant displays their wares.

old_shrine.name: Old Shrine
old_shrine.description:
An old shrine stands by the road.
Will you pray?

outcomes.silver: Found silver left by someone at the shrine.

bandit_ambush.name: Suspicious Presence
bandit_ambush.description:
You feel eyes watching.
Will you investigate?

outcomes.loot: Found loot dropped by fleeing bandits!

secret_scroll.name: Secret Scroll
secret_scroll.description:
An old scroll peeks from between rocks.
It seems to be a martial arts manual!

captured_warrior.name: Captured Warrior
captured_warrior.description:
A warrior is surrounded by assassins.
Will you help?

cursed_altar.name: Cursed Altar
cursed_altar.description:
A dark aura surrounds an altar.
Will you investigate?

ronin_duel.name: Ronin's Challenge
ronin_duel.description:
A ronin approaches and requests a duel.
"I wish to see your swordsmanship."

outcomes.forced: The ronin insists on fighting anyway!

sacred_shrine.name: Sacred Shrine
sacred_shrine.description:
A shrine to the god of swordsmanship.
"Offer tribute for the secrets of the blade..."

weapon_merchant.name: Weapon Merchant
weapon_merchant.description:
"Looking for fine blades?"
The merchant displays rare swords.
